Title: Antarmahal: Views of the Inner Chamber
Writer: Tarashankar Banerjee (original idea), Anjana Basu (research), Anjana Basu (screenplay), Mukul Bhattacharya (research), Debabrata Dutta (screenplay), Rituparno Ghosh (screenplay), Prem Prakash Modi (dialogue contributor)
Actors: Jackie Shroff, Abhishek Bachchan, Rupa Ganguly, Soha Ali Khan
Plot: In late 19th Century, Bengal Bhubaneswar Chowdhury (Jackie Shroff) is a wealthy and tyrannical Zamidar (Squire). He has two main obsessions: his desperate attempts for an heir, which even ...
